summary: ITEM 1. BUSINESS OVERVIEW Adobe is a global technology company with a mission to change the world through personalized digital experiences. For over four decades, Adobeâ€™s innovations have transformed how individuals, teams, businesses, enterprises, institutions, and governments engage and interact across all types of media. Our products, services and solutions are used around the world to imagine, create, manage, deliver, measure, optimize and engage with content across surfaces and fuel digital experiences. We have a diverse user base that includes consumers, communicators, creative professionals, developers, students, small and medium businesses and enterprises.
